title: The Future of Geoinformatics
description: What is the future of geospatial information systems in  artificial general intelligence, privatized Earth observation,  challenges to conservation, and increasing concentration of wealth? Speculations, answers,
special_requests: Include quotes from a diversity of sources including but by no means  limited to ESRI, Google Earth Engine, Google Deepmind, the United Nations, Project 2025 and the National Academy of Sciences.

title: Making A Life in Music
description: Perspectives on making a life in music in 2026  from a wide variety of sources including artists, entrepreneurs, online influencers, industry figures, lyricists, music historians, and experts in the future of music.

title: Female Friendship in Fourth-Wave Feminism
description: The importance of enduring friendship in fourth-wave friendship and the possibilities for its future in an as yet undefined fifth wave of feminism.

title: The Hundred Best Things Anyone Ever Said About Wine
